resources.string:
We require access to your files to provide you with the best possible experience. With your permission, we will be able to:

1-Upload and Download Files: Seamlessly upload files from your device and download files to it.
 2-Organize Your Files: Help you organize and manage your files efficiently within our application.
 3-Share Files: Easily share files with others directly from our app.
 4-Backup and Restore: Automatically back up your important files and restore them when needed.
 5-Edit Documents: Enable you to open, edit, and save changes to documents stored on your device.
